name: Estaleiro Mauá
opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday: 7:00 AM - 4:00 PM
address: R. Dr. Paulo Frumêncio, 153 - Ponta d'Areia, Niterói - RJ, 24040-150, Brazil
description: Estaleiro Mauá is a major shipyard in the Rio de Janeiro area, specializing in shipbuilding and repair, playing a significant role in the maritime and offshore industries.

name: Polo de Cinema e Vídeo de Jacarepaguá
address: Estr. dos Bandeirantes, 3000 - Jacarepaguá, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 22775-109, Brazil
description: This film studio complex is a major hub for the Brazilian film industry, hosting the production of movies, TV shows, and commercials, attracting businesses related to filmmaking and post-production.

name: Fundição Progresso
opening_hours: Monday to Friday: 10:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Saturday: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
address: Rua dos Arcos, 24 - Centro, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 20230-060, Brazil
description: A cultural hotspot that promotes music, art, and design. It serves as a key venue for creative professionals and businesses looking to engage with Rio’s vibrant cultural scene.

name: Porto do Rio de Janeiro
contact_info: Porto do Rio de Janeiro Office: +55 21 2222-2222
address: Av. Rodrigues Alves, s/n - Centro, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 20081-250, Brazil
description: As one of Brazil’s largest and most important ports, Porto do Rio de Janeiro is a key hub for international trade, connecting businesses to global markets and foreign investments.

name: Cristo Redentor
address: Parque Nacional da Tijuca - Alto da Boa Vista, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 22290-270, Brazil
description: One of the most iconic landmarks in the world, Cristo Redentor is a major tourist attraction and symbol of Brazil's culture and history.

name: Petrobras Headquarters
address: Av. República do Chile, 65 - Centro, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 20031-912, Brazil
description: Petrobras is a global leader in oil and gas extraction, with its headquarters in Rio de Janeiro. It plays a crucial role in Brazil's energy sector and offshore exploration.

name: Web Summit Rio
address: Riocentro - Av. Salvador Allende, 6555 - Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 22783-127, Brazil
description: One of the world's leading tech conferences, Web Summit Rio brings together startups, investors, and tech companies for networking and innovation.

name: Fashion Rio
address: Av. Rodrigues Alves, 10 - Centro, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, 20081-250, Brazil
description: Fashion Rio is one of the most important fashion events in Brazil, showcasing top designers and brands. It serves as a key platform for businesses in design, production, sales, and marketing.
